content.rendered:
Prime Gardens, Arepo, Lagos-Ibadan Expressway

Prime Gardens, Arepo is a home within a home; it is an exquisite estate with cutting-edge amenities. This estate is located in the heart of Arepo’s architectural beauty, surrounded by other estates and built-up properties. It is conveniently located and has excellent accessibility. It is also free of all government encumbrances, making it a safe and secure investment for investors.

LANDMARK:

  • Punch Newspaper
  • Lagos-Ibadan Expressway
  • Road Network to Ikorodu
  • Journalists Estate
  • Voera Estate
  • Amusement Park
  • Excellent Schools etc.

PROXIMITY:

  • Prime Gardens is just 10 minutes drive after Berger on the Lagos
  • Ibadan Expressway; it’s about 40 minutes drive to Victoria Island, Lagos.

TOPOGRAPHY: Prime Gardens is 60% dry

DOCUMENT TITLE Prime Gardens Arepo is 100% free from government acquisition; it has a registered survey and deed of assignment.

COORDINATES: 547623mE, 739270mN

PRICE:

  • 600SQM: ₦7,500,000
  • 450SQM: ₦5,625,000
  • 300SQM: ₦3,750,000

VIDEOS:
